_aChangeLog.text: made nate's stage boosters more consistent (s/o ketza)
First surf skip in the video is now not a surf skip, triggers removed
There are now slopes instead of some ramps for smoother gameplay
Map flow should not be as bad now, but id suggest just not playing if you dont like surf =)

_aLatestUpdates._sText:
Hey, mister runner! Do you not like silly surf ramps? Great, because I removed and reworked some of them! And no, I will NOT remove the spins.

Special thanks: unity/kris.

_sText:
From imagination to art.

A year ago, I wanted to create the best map i can, so I started making bhop_shutdown. As you may know, it had a lot of problems and overall was not a great map, however I tried my best and personally think that it was quite successful. Now I tried my best again and made maybe not the best, but surely a great map that i can be proud of. Shutdown2 is a sequel to the first shutdown - same concept of flybhop/surf combined map with intentional skips and simple strafe elements that is fun and more or less easy on both auto and scroll, yet very hard to run.

This map tells you a story about how an idea is born in a creator's mind and what the creator has to face throughout developing his idea. As a contradiction to the first shutdown, it is set in a world that is being developed from scratch. 

Gameplay-wise, I have tried to improve wherever i could to make the map more fun to run and play casually. It has a lot of surfs and spins so I should probably say sorry to people with low sens, haha.

I used a lot of assets in this map - comment for credit if i forgot you.

Music: 

https://soundcloud.com/sodxwxter/bhop_shutdown2
